metadata.synopsis: This AD plays during combat with Chop, the Colony Butcher. Chop will fight you because he is enthralled, but has a secret desire to be put out of his misery.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe COL_Butcher" or use the debugbook to go to the Colony Morgue- Enable godmode with "god"- Attack Chop, the butcher- After a certain amount of turns, Chop will say this AD. You can Ctrl+Shift+End to skip combat turns and speed up the process.

0.speaker: Chop
0.text: Kill me. No more voices. No more red. Only peace. Only dead.
0.context: NodeContext: Anguished moment of lucidity cried out during combat. Wants to be put out of his misery,
